bug.author: JavierBZ
bug.summary: Error in tio.RandomAffine: 'Transform' object has no attribute 'AddTransform'
bug.description: üêõBug Missing 'AddTransform' attribute in 'Transform' object from tio.RandomAffine. To reproduce I used your Colab <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1tI35u7V1ogDTKzaraXwwZRMebBIYiqOe?usp=sharing>Tutorial</denchmark-link> for Data Preprocessing and Data Augmentation, and in the example in section Spatial Transforms > Random Affine with the code. random_affine = tio.RandomAffine(seed=0) slice_affine = random_affine(slice_grid) to_pil(slice_affine) i get this error in the second line of code. AttributeError: 'Transform' object has no attribute 'AddTransform' Expected behavior Random Affine transformation of the example grid Actual behavior Error TorchIO version 0.17.25

comments.comment:
Hi, Javier.
1. Can you provide a minimally working example as it's asked in the issue template? 2. Can you try with the latest version? `pip install --upgrade torchio` <denchmark-link:#>‚Ä¶</denchmark-link>
On Wed, 14 Oct 2020, 15:04 JavierBZ, ***@***.***> wrote: *üêõBug*
*To reproduce*
random_affine = tio.RandomAffine(seed=0) slice_affine = random_affine(slice_grid) to_pil(slice_affine)
AttributeError: 'Transform' object has no attribute 'AddTransform'
*Expected behavior*
*Actual behavior*
*TorchIO version*
0.17.25
‚Äî You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#331>, or unsubscribe <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ADAZVVH36DTSF4TXPASDRRDSKWVXRANCNFSM4SQU653A> .

Hi, Fernando.
The example is on your public tutorial on section Spatial Transforms > Random Affine.
I tried the latest version and it works now! i think the problem is in your setup code of the tutorial
!pip install torchio==0.17.25 --quiet Probably that version causes the problem in RandomAffine. Thanks for your quick reply!

Oh, I see. Where did you find that link? It's an old version. This is a newer version of that tutorial: <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/github/fepegar/miccai-educational-challenge-2020/blob/master/Data_preprocessing_and_augmentation_using_TorchIO_a_tutorial.ipynb>https://colab.research.google.com/github/fepegar/miccai-educational-challenge-2020/blob/master/Data_preprocessing_and_augmentation_using_TorchIO_a_tutorial.ipynb</denchmark-link>
